hooks.command: node -e "const p=process.argv[1]||'';const fs=require('fs');if(p.includes('.web.')){const native=p.replace(/\.web\.js$/,'.js');if(fs.existsSync(native)){console.log('\u26a0\ufe0f  REMINDER: Native counterpart exists: '+native+' \u2014 make sure to update it too!')}}else if(p.endsWith('.js')||p.endsWith('.jsx')){const web=p.replace(/\.js$/,'.web.js');if(!p.includes('.web.')&&fs.existsSync(web)){console.log('\u26a0\ufe0f  REMINDER: Web counterpart exists: '+web+' \u2014 make sure to update it too!')}}" -- "$CLAUDE_FILE_PATH"
